title: What did Selena Quintanilla died from? - Quora

response.answer_text: She was brutally murdered by her Fan Club president/ “best friend” Yolanda Saldivar who shot her behind the back and she suffered too much blood running from the hotel room to the lobby, although she was a Jehovah’s Witness and her parents denied a blood transfusion, she was given quite a few but yet she wasn’t able to survive.

After the Quintanilla family confronted her, Saldívar bought a gun, lured Selena to a motel room, and shot her in the back. Although doctors tried to revive Selena, she was pronounced dead from loss of blood and cardiac arrest.
